name: Awe Fishing! Off The Hook
description:
Ready your gear and dive into a world of Awe Fishing!
Use lanterns as bait, cast your line and set your hook for fishing fun.
Start with a smaller fish and use it as a bait to catch the big ones.
Watch your line or fish may snap!

*Visit each of 4 Fantasy Oceans!
*Chase and catch 11 mysterious sea creatures on your fantasy journey
*Find legendary all-golden treasure chest
*Buy new ships and upgrade fishing equipment
*Beware of the dangers lurking in the deep!
*Play one of the two addictive game modes: relaxing Fishing mode or intense Starfall collect and avoid mode!
*Climb to the top of the Leaderboards!
*Listen beautiful music and gratifying sound effects while sailing through fantasy Ocean
*Enjoy polished and intuitive controls: Tilt to move, Tap to throw lanterns and cast the line.

Fantasy styled graphics, catchy soundtracks, gratifying gameplay and tons of Loot!
The Ocean is calling, Start your fantasy journey now!


LIKE US ON FACEBOOK:
https://www.facebook.com/fishingfantasy

FOLLOW US ON TWITTER:

Don't hesitate to share your feedback and ideas!
